name: Spirit of Omen's Awakening: Hydro
description:
Character deals +1 DMG and converts Physical DMG to Hydro DMG.
This character takes +2 Hydro DMG.
Duration (Rounds): 2
descriptionraw: Character <color=#FFFFFFFF>deals +1 DMG</color> and converts $[K100] to $[K102].\nThis character takes +2 $[K102].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>
